title: 30. How Do We Know if Alcohol Is Bad for Us?
description: Getting solid answers in medicine can be hard — especially when the normal tools are off-limits. Dr. Bapu Jena discusses a research method that’s helping to solve some of science’s most challenging questions.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
